messages.content: /generate AutoClaim Defender — A simple and safe Minecraft protection plugin that automatically claims a configurable area of land (such as nearby chunks) when a player places their first chest, crafting table, or furnace, helping prevent accidental or unwanted changes by others. It includes an easy-to-use trust system with commands like trust player and untrust player, manual claim tools such as claim, abandonclaim, and claims, optional visual borders using particles, and protections that safely limit things like TNT, lava, and piston use inside claims. Admin tools allow for safe moderation, and optional economy support can limit or manage additional claims — making it ideal for friendly survival or casual servers."
